plugin.title: HD Plugin
plugin.compatibility: Compatible with 4.3; dock button works from 4.5
plugin.author: LongTail Video
plugin.description: This plugin implements an HD quality toggle in the controlbar. An icon is shown to do the toggle, and the value is saved as a cookie. This plugin works for single files and playlists (in the latter case, a new playlist is loaded). For the 4.5 button or higher, the plugin can also place a button in the dock. As of version 1.3, the plugin will not restart the video after a switch when using streaming servers.

flashvar.name: bitrate
flashvar.description: Bitrate of the HD file to play. This is automatically picked up for HTTP streamed files, but not for RTMP streamed files. Therefore you can set an HD bitrate through this flashvar.

flashvar.name: file
flashvar.description: Location of the HD video the player should load. The regular 'file' flashvar holds the location of the fallback video.

flashvar.name: fullscreen
flashvar.description: When true, the HD file is automatically turned on when going fullscreen. The HD file is automatically turned off when returning to normal screen again.
